result.markdown:
---
title: "Randomized Controlled Trials"
---


::: callout-note
:::

::: {.cell hash='06_rct_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_10fbbc8f14024f7a39dd5bb439056223'}

```{.r .cell-code}
abtest_data<-readRDS("C:/Users/mouni/Downloads/Causal_Data_Science_Data/Causal_Data_Science_Data/abtest_online.rds")
```
:::


1.)

::: {.cell hash='06_rct_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_61d6f07503c25da48ce0e47ec3d1a3d0'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2)

compare_previous_visit<-ggplot(abtest_data, aes(x = chatbot, y = previous_visit, color = as.factor(chatbot))) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(title = "Covariate Balance Check",
       x = "Chatbot (False = Control, True = Treatment)",
       y = "Previous Visit")
compare_mobiledevice<-ggplot(abtest_data, aes(x = chatbot, y = mobile_device, color = as.factor(chatbot))) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(title = "Covariate Balance Check",
       x = "Chatbot (False = Control, True = Treatment)",
       y = "Mobile Device")
compare_purchase<-ggplot(abtest_data, aes(x = chatbot, y = purchase_amount, color = as.factor(chatbot))) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(title = "Covariate Balance Check",
       x = "Chatbot (False = Control, True = Treatment)",
       y = "Purchase amount")
compare_previous_visit
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](06_rct_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
compare_mobiledevice
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](06_rct_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
compare_purchase
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](06_rct_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-3.png){width=672}
:::
:::



2.)

::: {.cell hash='06_rct_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_fd46574791b8fbeb9c3021b36ac8998f'}

```{.r .cell-code}
model<-lm(purchase_amount~chatbot+previous_visit+mobile_device,data=abtest_data)
summary(model)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> 
#> Call:
#> lm(formula = purchase_amount ~ chatbot + previous_visit + mobile_device, 
#>     data = abtest_data)
#> 
#> Residuals:
#>     Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
#> -25.414 -14.428  -8.435  12.559  64.584 
#> 
#> Coefficients:
#>                   Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
#> (Intercept)        15.2840     1.1227  13.614  < 2e-16 ***
#> chatbotTRUE        -6.8488     1.1792  -5.808 8.49e-09 ***
#> previous_visit      0.7792     0.2869   2.716  0.00673 ** 
#> mobile_deviceTRUE  -0.8562     1.2642  -0.677  0.49841    
#> ---
#> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
#> 
#> Residual standard error: 18.6 on 996 degrees of freedom
#> Multiple R-squared:  0.04243,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.03954 
#> F-statistic: 14.71 on 3 and 996 DF,  p-value: 2.228e-09
```
:::
:::

3.)

::: {.cell hash='06_rct_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_7a23efa6b3a7b6448a5c75297bb5f014'}

```{.r .cell-code}
model_sub<-lm(purchase_amount~chatbot*mobile_device + chatbot*previous_visit,data=abtest_data)
summary(model_sub)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> 
#> Call:
#> lm(formula = purchase_amount ~ chatbot * mobile_device + chatbot * 
#>     previous_visit, data = abtest_data)
#> 
#> Residuals:
#>     Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
#> -22.057 -15.928  -7.419  12.804  65.333 
#> 
#> Coefficients:
#>                               Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
#> (Intercept)                    17.2052     1.2982  13.253  < 2e-16 ***
#> chatbotTRUE                   -11.1064     1.8434  -6.025 2.38e-09 ***
#> mobile_deviceTRUE              -0.8791     1.7823  -0.493 0.621943    
#> previous_visit                 -0.1030     0.3749  -0.275 0.783562    
#> chatbotTRUE:mobile_deviceTRUE   0.2044     2.5148   0.081 0.935229    
#> chatbotTRUE:previous_visit      2.0978     0.5781   3.629 0.000299 ***
#> ---
#> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
#> 
#> Residual standard error: 18.49 on 994 degrees of freedom
#> Multiple R-squared:  0.05495,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.0502 
#> F-statistic: 11.56 on 5 and 994 DF,  p-value: 7.177e-11
```
:::
:::


4.)

::: {.cell hash='06_rct_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_e598ff3d3a8818038e85aa8836a91795'}

```{.r .cell-code}
logistic_model<-glm(purchase~chatbot+previous_visit+mobile_device,data=abtest_data,family="binomial")
summary(logistic_model)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> 
#> Call:
#> glm(formula = purchase ~ chatbot + previous_visit + mobile_device, 
#>     family = "binomial", data = abtest_data)
#> 
#> Coefficients:
#>                   Estimate Std. Error z value Pr(>|z|)    
#> (Intercept)       -0.22185    0.12347  -1.797  0.07237 .  
#> chatbotTRUE       -0.96894    0.13564  -7.144 9.09e-13 ***
#> previous_visit     0.10606    0.03262   3.252  0.00115 ** 
#> mobile_deviceTRUE -0.07119    0.14530  -0.490  0.62417    
#> ---
#> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
#> 
#> (Dispersion parameter for binomial family taken to be 1)
#> 
#>     Null deviance: 1329.1  on 999  degrees of freedom
#> Residual deviance: 1262.2  on 996  degrees of freedom
#> AIC: 1270.2
#> 
#> Number of Fisher Scoring iterations: 4
```
:::
:::
